result.eng: The price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ga: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.orig: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.html: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go CorcaighThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ponchtml: An praġas a íoctar ar áḃar a ẛeolaḋ ó Ḃaile Áṫa Cliaṫ go CorcaiġThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.

result.html: An praghas móide cáin bhreisluachaThe price, plus value-added tax.
result.ponchtml: An praġas móide cáin ḃreisluaċaThe price, plus value-added tax.

result.eng: Did you pay the full price?
result.ga: Ar íoc tú an praghas iomlán
result.orig: Ar íoc tú an praghas iomlán
result.html: Ar íoc tú an praghas iomlánDid you pay the full price?
result.ponchtml: Ar íoc tú an praġas iomlánDid you pay the full price?

result.eng: They sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.
result.html: Díolann siad beoir ar róphraghasThey sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.
result.ponchtml: Díolann siad beoir ar róṗraġasThey sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.

result.html: Dúirt mé an praghas leisI told him the price.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé an praġas leisI told him the price.

result.eng: Do you have a special price for a family?
result.ga: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.orig: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.html: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlannDo you have a special price for a family?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil praġas speisialta agaiḃ do ċlannDo you have a special price for a family?
